item.title: 2021 - IT Industry Predictions

item.title: DevOps – Automating Kubernetes Deployments
item.description: If you are deploying your own Kubernetes clusters you already know that: But there is hope! There are a few great projects to keep an eye on in this space. I’ve covered some of them in an article you can read on the Lumen. Cheers!
